description:
The Phantom Thieves agree to help Akechi by changing the heart of Makoto`s sister, public prosecutor Sae Niijima, so they infiltrate her Palace. Meanwhile, a man who claims to be a relative of Futaba`s pays Sojiro a visitâ€¦
Source: crunchyroll
